senses: [{"definition":"To cause to move faster; to quicken the motion of; to add to the speed of.","example":null},{"definition":"To quicken the natural or ordinary progression or process of.","example":"to accelerate the growth of a plant, the increase of wealth, etc."},{"definition":"To cause a change of velocity.","example":null},{"definition":"To hasten, as the occurrence of an event.","example":"to accelerate our departure"},{"definition":"To enable a student to finish a course of study in less than normal time.","example":null},{"definition":"To become faster; to begin to move more quickly.","example":null},{"definition":"Grow; increase.","example":null},{"definition":"Accelerated; quickened; hastened; hurried.","example":null}]
